name: Lycatalk
overview:
Lycatalk is a high quality long distance pinless service which can be used from your existing phone numbers and you can also monitor all your call records online, this will not only give you complete satisfaction for the money you pay but also you can easily budget your spending. In order to use Lycatalk you donâ€™t have to change your existing mobile number or land line number and also you can add up to 9 different phone numbers to one single Lycatalk account. Lycatalk assures and guarantees that there are No Maintenance or Hidden Charges for using this service at any given time, which makes us, stand out from other providers. The success of this unique service in UK has prompted us to launch Lycatalk in Austria, Australia, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, France, Germany, Holland, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, USA totaling 17 countries, with roaring success and acquire more than 7 million customers.

Lycatalk Features:

100% Guaranteed minutes No connection charge No maintenance charge No expiry date Multilingual customer service No pin dialling No fees or binding Great rates Choose local access number Speed Dial IVR top-up Auto top-up Online call history
